name: WYS Day One - A Trip Down Memory Lane (Will You Snail Fan-game)
name_original: WYS Day One - A Trip Down Memory Lane (Will You Snail Fan-game)
description:
A trip down memory lane!

Ever since I saw Jonas Tyroller's first Will You Snail devlog, I wondered what it would be like to play the prototype from day one of development... So I recreated it.

To clarify, this is fan-made, and it's just a recreation. This obviously isn't the OFFICIAL source file for the prototype.

This game only has one level because it is a remake of the prototype at the BEGINNING of the first devlog, which Jonas stated he had "made yesterday," making THAT prototype "day one." There's also no music, and the controls are slightly off, but hey, I tried.
